From the brand

Aterod

Enjoy Pleasure When Gardening with Our Expandable Water Hose!

Aterod is a manufacturer specializing in the research, development, production and sales of garden water pipes. Our goal is to provide every guest with a safe and durable expandable garden hose that allows guests to enjoy gardening time.

Aterod Black Garden Hose

Atreod Expandable Hose

Amazing durability, lightweight hoses.
Solid brass connectors.
10 functional nozzle.
Easy to use and store.

Read more

About Aterod

We specialize in horticultural products. Every product from Aterod was created with one consistent mission – Enjoy pleasure when gardening. At Aterod, we work passionately to create products with simplicity and usability.

Warning: After the water source is turned off, the hose will shrink, the changed water pressure may cause the faucet to shrink irregularly. Keep children away before turning off water to avoid unexpected harm to the surrounding people.

Garden Hose with 10-pattern Sprayer Nozzle

Water hose is a must for easy outdoor work. Are you looking for a hose to wash your dirty car, wall, outdoor windows, pets and water your garden? You may also have been tired of the traditional short poor-quality plastic hose, hoping to get longer service lift. Now, there is unmissable chance for you to try our Expandable Water Hose.

  • Expands 3 times its length when water pressure is on
  • Self drains itself when not in use
  • No tangles, twists or hinks
  • Easy to store in very small places

Read more

Features

Car Washing

When was the last time you had fun washing your car? With this water hose, one thing you can be sure of is having fun. If you have been putting off washing your car due to it being a boring task then this water hose is for you. You can enjoy the car wash in your garage.

Watering Flowers/Vegetables

The hose grows long and super strong enough for any size job. Perfect for gardens, terraces, patios and more, you just turn on the water and watch the hose grow and grow and grow. Enjoy gardening and want to keep your garden hydrated.

Pets washing

With this water hose, the Pet Sprayer provides an easy and effective way to wash your pet minus the frustrating leaks from inferior craftsmanship in the past. Make Your Pet Enjoy Bath and Massage with Ease.

Read more

Washing Windows/Walls/Floor/Fish Tank/Boat, etc.

This water hose is easy to assemble, transport, lightweight, convenient and powerful enough for most smaller jobs like cleaning screens, small porches, walls, floor, garage, etc. Perfect for many applications including cleaning windows, ATVS, motos, decks and other areas around the hose.

Read more

From the brand

Giraffe Tools

Gear that works hard so you don’t have to

Giraffe Tools is the global leader in Hose & Hose Reel. Our products aim to truly benefit our consumer’s daily lives. Giraffe Tools insistence on automatic retraction technology in hose reel / pressure washer / cord reel industries has allowed the brand’s products to maintain its outstanding quality for more than decades.

Shop more garden hose

What makes our products unique?

Giraffe Tools has complete sets of modernized production facilities, much-specialized personnel and reputable designers.

Why do we love what we do?

Our team is constantly making a concerted effort to keep pushing forward in the pursuit of creating exceptional products that add value to everyday lives.

What problem are we solving?

Under our strict quality-monitoring framework, all products pass multiple inspection processes which provides consumers more safeguard.

Wide Applications: The water hose can be cut to whatever length you want. Long enough to clean roof, front and back yard, and short enough to be a lead-in hose.
NO KINK: The newest material is memoryless, the heavy duty hose will not kink, and easily coil and uncoil. The 3-layers design allows the hose to remain flexible under extreme temperatures.
Lightweight and Durable: Using the latest hybrid material from rubber and polymer, it is much lighter, more durable, and wear-resistant than the traditional rubber hose.
Special Design: The amazing part of this hose is that it can be re-used. If one part is broken, you can cut it off, and get the fittings re-connected. This one hose can be used throughout your whole lifetime. Great for garden, lawn, yard, car washing, and pets cleanings.
2-Year Limited Warranty: The Giraffe team has always been committed to improving the quality of life for everyone and enabling more families to enjoy the pleasures of the yard. All products are 2-year limited warranty for worry-free shopping.

Hybrid Garden Hose

  • All weather flexibility
  • Durable and wear resistant
  • 3/4in. brass plated fittings
  • Kink resistant
  • Lightweight
  • Easy to coil and uncoil
  • Leakproof with rubber washer

Customize Garden Hose Male to Female

Connector could be re-installed.

The hose can be cut to any length as you want.

If the hose may kink or leak, you could cut the defective part, and re-install the connector. Got a brand new hose.

Adapted the hybrid polymer material, makes the hose more lightweight, and flexible.

No kinks of the hose. Fulfill all your garden watering.

*6ft/15ft for leader hose

*25/50ft for watering plants and flowers

*75ft/100ft for cleaning roof and backyard

Read more

SOLID FITTING (Male & Female Ends)

  • Brass plating aluminum material, effectively prevent corrosion or wear, for a longer service life
  • 3/4″ large diameter connection for full and unobstructed water flow
  • Clear and standard threads, female end with washer to eliminate water leakage troubles

Read more

TESTED TOUGH

Its super strong flexible hybrid polymer material is abrasion-resistant. This hose has been tested rigorously to confirm burst strength and Durable. Giraffe hose owns longer life.

Read more

Product Description

Next Generation Garden Hoses!

Out with the old clumsy, kinking garden hose! The Joey’s garden hose features the latest in garden hose innovation. Inner latex core and outer elasticized fabric work together to form the ultimate garden hose. The Joeys Garden hose expands up to 3x its original size using standard water pressure and will shrink back to size when pressure is turned off. Superbly flexible, the hose will not kink or twist.

Our Garden Hose Features: Solid Brass Connectors Fits Any Standard Spigot 8 Pattern Hose Spray Nozzle Expandable Up To 3X Available in 4 Sizes

Hose Spray Nozzle Included

Included with every Joey’s garden hose is a hose spray nozzle. 8 patterns include vertical, flat, center, stream, mist, soaker, shower and cone patterns! Featuring a rubber handle, the nozzle is easy to grip.

Solid Brass Connectors

Our hoses are finished off with solid brass connectors to ensure an easy and secure fit with any standard spigot. Connectors will not warp or rust.

Expandable up to 3X

Featuring the latest in hose engineering, hour garden hose can stretch up to 3x using standard hose pressure. When pressure is turned off the hose will immediately shrink back to its original size.

Expandable up to 3X its size- Our garden hose can expand up to 3x under standard water pressure and then immediately shrink back to its original size for easy storage.
Solid Brass Connectors- Each hose is tipped with solid brass connectors to ensure the hose can screw on easily to any standard spigot.
Hose Spray Nozzle Included- 8 pattern hose spray nozzle has a rubber handle for easy grip.

From the brand

Ruitool Saw

How did we get our start?

Ruitool is specialises in woodworking tools and we have a wide range of tools that will make your work more efficient and convenient.

What makes our products unique?

1.Durable & Flexible Saw Blade

2.SK5 high-carbon steel

3.Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

4.Comfortable Handle

Why do we love what we do?

Our staff have previous experience in woodworking. We know exactly which products are really effective and easy to use. And we hope that our products will make your work easier and more enjoyable.

【Durable & Flexible Saw Blade】: The hand saw blade is made of SK5 high-carbon steel. The Japanese pull saw teeth are processed by a high-frequency hardening machine imported from Japan, and the hardness can reach HRC60-63 degrees.
【Double Edged】: One side of Japanese hand saw is 17TPI for cutting hardwood, and the other side is 14TPI for cutting softwood.
【Hardened 3-Edge Teeth】: The hand saw has three-sided grinding gear design, sharp edge, faster chip removal, and smoother cutting.
【Comfortable Handle】: Exquisite beech wood handle and slight curve design make the saw handle comfortable to hold, and the operation is more labor-saving.
【Enrich Your Woodworking Life】: Straight shank double-sided small hand saw, small and light, suitable for fine cutting and small parts production, it is the best choice for woodworking DIY.

Flexible Saw Blade

Wood saw with 1/50” ultra-thin saw blade, light weight and flexible, high toughness and wear-resistant, suitable for joinery flush cutting.

Comfortable Beech Handle

Ryoba saw non-slip durable beech wood handle, compact and beautiful. Very suitable for woodworking beginners.

Two Different TPI

Double edged design, one side tooth is 14TPI, other size is 17TPI. Can better meet different cutting needs.

Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

The three-blade serration is hardened to effectively improve the sharpness and wear resistance. The cutting speed of the saw is 3 times faster than that of an ordinary saw.

From the brand

SHLINUX LIGHTING Brand:

Shlinux always focus the Research and Innovation in lighting industryWe have been adhering to the principle of quality firstOur Team create this kind of desk lamp with remote, very practical and functional!We still make unremitting efforts to create better productsBest Wishes ！

Shlinux Distinct Desk Lamp

White color remote control desk lamp, light up your working station

18W LED 3 Modes 6 Brightness, Modern Desk Light for Home Office

A bright desk lamp suitable for 2 computers lighting. fits nicely behind the monitor, extend up and over to shine on their surface.

【Stepless Dimming with two control ways】 LED lamp has 3 color modes for warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), white light(6000K). Each lighting mode has 6 brightness dimming levels. So there are 18 lighting modes to meet all requirements. This architect desk lamp is controlled by touch sensitive switch on lamp bar or a remote controller, very conveniently
【Eye Protection and Memory Function】 Our clamp light is composed of 96 LED beads, it has uniform brightness, NO GLARE, NO FLICKERING, soft light, which can protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, It is ideal for reading, drawing, sewing, working, studying. The clamp desk lamp is a good help for kids & bookworms, one key for reading mode, memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used
【Space Saving and Modern Style】 Task light with sturdy metal clamp, which can support a tabletop thickness up to 2.6 inches. It holds the gooseneck lamp securely in place. The metal clamp is also equipped with a silicone pad to avoid scratching table. The flexible gooseneck study lamp, which can be adjusted 360° to provide multi-directional lighting, and is easy to carry and more save space than stand-up desk lamp
【Quality Warranty】SHLINUX always supply good quality led lamp. what included in box : A Shlinux led desk light, An English Manual & Quality Power Adapter and warranty service, and 24H friendly customer support

SHLINUX Upgrade 18W Bright Led Gooseneck Desk Lamp Illuminate Entire Workbench

SHLINUX clamp lamp has 96 LED Beads,18.2 inch lamp bar in length, offer 1511 Lumen, about 100w incandescent bulb equivalent, to illuminate every corner of your table,Born with 360°adjustable gooseneck design with durable metal clamp, SHLINUX study lamp is fully diffused and lighting stably and gently without flickering, also which can prevent blue light damaged to the eyes.

It is featured with memory function,then your last lighting setting will be turned on again when work lamp was powered-on,very convenient. saving space with a metal clamp supports to 2.6inch/7.5cm wide desk, fix the clamp light where needed, it won’t take any desk space.

It supports 3 colors and 6 brightness levels under each color mode,you will get 18 lighting modes to meet all your daily requirements

EYE-CARING, NO FLICKER, NO GLARE

NO LIMIT LIGHT DIRECTION, NO SHADOW !

SHLINUX Architect Desk Clamp Lamp

Upgrade Horizontal lighting bar with Flexible Gooseneck

EASY TO CONTROL THIS MODERN DESK LAMP

Sensitive touch (one key will finish all functions select exclude the timer)

  • Holding touch will change the brightness

Remote Control

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:06 UTC – Details)

Product Description

【2022 Upgrade Stable Tablet Stand】 Made of Heavy duty aluminum-magnesium alloy solid cord , stiffened material, very sturdy and flexible. 30 inches (76 CM) Overall Length from bottom to top. Moreover, compared to most of the tablet stands on the market, our tablet holder is upgraded, the bottom is additionally reinforced to ensure its maximum stability. Make it strong and sturdy to protect your cellphone and tablet.
【Broad Compatibility】 VIVI MAO tablet holder has a wide range of compatibility, suitable for almost all 4.7-12.9 inch devices on the market, such as iPad mini 2 3 4 5,iPad Pro 9.7 10.5 11 12.9, iPad Air 2 3 4, Galaxy tabs, Switch, Fire HD tab , iPhone 13 /pro Max /Pro/X/11 10 8 7 6 , Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1″ 10.5″ 9.7″ 9.6″ 8″, Kindle Fire HD 7 8 10 , ect. In addition, the tablet phone is equipped with silicone pads, which will protect your device from scratch and damage.
【Reinforced Bolt Clamp Base】Reinforced and thickened base, not easy to break. Non-slip silicone pads are added to the base clip to avoid damage to your furniture. The base has a maximum clamp size of 3.7 inches, maximizing usability. Whether you’re laying in bed watching movie, viewing recipes in the kitchen,exercising in the gym, or using your devices anywhere, you don’t have to worry about falling and breaking it.
【Easy to Mount & Position】 This gooseneck clamp can be mount to many places like bed headboard, desk or table next to your favorite chair. With 360 degree rotate clip and flexble arm, It can be adjusted to your eye level or any other height you want. Free your hands when watching movies, playing games, reading, viewing recipes, recording videos, etc.
【Using Tips】1. Please loop the long arm into “S or Z “shape or circle shape helps maintain more stability . 2. The material of the holder is stronger for the heavy tablet, it will be a litte hard to bend, so please use your both hands to bend the holder when you start to use it. 3. This type of gooseneck tablet holder is perfect for reading,viewing,or recording. But when you tap on your tablet frequently , it unavoidably bounces and wobbles due to some law of physics.

Product Description

Cool gadgets tool for mechanics, electricians, handyman, craftsman, engineers, DIYers to do some repair work.

The flexible flashlight is plenty bright enough for a tight enclosed space or dark working corner.Lightweight, strong magnets, good battery life.Small clip to secure telescoping flashlight to your pocket.No need to bend over or get up and look for a flashlight when you drop something metal.Lightweight easy to carry in purse, bag, car, basically anywhere.Extending magnet tool has a bending neck with 360° flexibility, and it will help you reach the awkward, cramped space.

Awesome New Addition for any Toolbox

Great Gifts for men! Special Holiday Gifts Guide:

Valentines day gifts for him husbandBirthday gifts for men who have everythingChristmas giftsFather day giftsStocking stuffers for Men / WomenThanksgiving day giftsUnique Gifts for Men & Women Who Have Everything!

Gifts for Men & Cool Gadget: Mens gifts for Dad, Husband, Boyfriend on Christmas, Thanksgiving Day, Birthday, Valentine’s Day, Father’s Day, etc. Men won’t know they need a magnetic pickup tool until they have! A cool gadget, unusual gift idea for men women who have everything. Unique stocking stuffers for men and women will be glad to add this item to their toolboxes.
Magnetic Pickup Tool Kit (5 Pieces): The kits includes 1 Telescoping Flexible Extensible Mini Flashlights, 1 Round 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror, 1 Square 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror, 1 piece 15lb Magnetic Pick Up Rod and 1 piece 1lb Magnetic Pick Up Rod.
Super Bright Flashlight：The super bright LED light has 3pcs super-bright LED beads to provide greater visibility in dark spaces. The telescoping flexible head with a powerful magnet can accurately pick up metal objects from hard-to-reach areas. And the magnetic base can be attached to the metal, free your hands, to illuminate the place where you need it.
360°Rotation Round & Square Inspection Mirrors: Telescoping inspection mirror is a good tool to meet your inspection needs, with a telescoping rod, the length of the handheld rod can be adjusted according to your needs, and it can be reduced to the smallest size after use, which is convenient to carry and store; the neck mirror can be rotated 360 degrees for easy observation hard-to-reach areas.
Widely Application: Could be used for finding metal nuts, bolts, screws, and other metal pieces; It’s easy to retrieve and pickup nails, pieces, small metal block and debris in tight spaces or hard to reach corners, such as behind HVAC appliances, cabinets, automobile parts, work benches etc.
